info.title: OpenAPI Plant Store
info.description: A sample API that uses a plant store as an example to demonstrate features in the OpenAPI specification

get.description: Check the health status of the AI detection service
Check the health status of the Faceswap Detection service.

post.summary: Detect deepfakes or analyze for scam-related content
post.description: This endpoint receives an image file and processes it to detect deepfake faces.

file.description: The image file to be processed.

items.description: The likelihood of fakeness for each face in the image, ranging from 0 (real) to 1 (fake).

x.description: The X coordinate of the face.

y.description: The Y coordinate of the face.

width.description: The width of the face bounding box.

height.description: The height of the face bounding box.

post.summary: Clone voice from sample and text
post.description: Takes an uploaded voice sample and synthesizes speech from the given text.

text.description: Text to synthesize using the cloned voice

post.description: Detect malicious, phishing, or suspicious URLs using ML models and Google Web Risk API

url.description: The URL to analyze for maliciousness

post.description: Detect AI-generated images using base64 encoded image data

task_id.description: Unique identifier for the detection task

get.description: Returns all plants from the system that the user has access to

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return

post.description: Creates a new plant in the store

requestBody.description: Plant to add to the store

delete.description: Deletes a single plant based on the ID supplied

post.description: Analyze a URL for phishing, malware, or scam risks and return a verdict and confidence score.

url.description: The URL to analyze for threats.

processing_time_ms.description: Time taken to process the URL in milliseconds.

post.description: Analyze multiple URLs for phishing, malware, or scam risks in a single request. Returns a verdict and confidence score for each URL.

processing_time_ms.description: Time taken to process the URL in milliseconds.

example.detail: One or more URLs are invalid

post.summary: Detect malicious or phishing QR codes
post.description: Upload a QR code image for threat analysis. The service decodes the QR code and checks the destination for phishing, malware, or scam risks.

file.description: The QR code image file to be analyzed.

decoded_url.description: The URL extracted from the QR code.

processing_time_ms.description: Time taken to process the QR code in milliseconds.

post.description: Upload multiple QR code image files for threat analysis in a single request. Each QR code is decoded and checked for phishing, malware, or scam risks.

images.description: Array of QR code image files to analyze.

decoded_url.description: The URL extracted from the QR code.

processing_time_ms.description: Time taken to process the QR code in milliseconds.

example.detail: One or more files exceed maximum size
One or more files have unsupported format
One or more QR codes could not be decoded

get.description: Monitor the health and status of the URL and QR code detection services. Use this endpoint to verify that the detection services are running and models are loaded before making detection requests.

status.description: Overall service health status (healthy, degraded, unhealthy)

models_loaded.description: Whether detection models are loaded and ready

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when health check was performed

version.description: Current version of the detection service

uptime_seconds.description: Service uptime in seconds since last restart

text_to_synthesize.example: Hello, this is a test of the voice cloning technology for security testing purposes.

notes.example: Multiple faces analyzed. No significant faceswap indicators.

ai_response.example: Metadata analysis reveals inconsistencies suggesting potential tampering.

payload.example: This is a sample text that may have been generated by an AI system.
